title: epiphany
description:
Taylor ties in two heartbreaking true stories in this deeply emotional song.. The devastation and despair of battle and of those on the frontlines during the pandemic.
What do you think of this song? What would you like to hear from us? There are lots of ways to contact us!
CONTACT THE PODCAST!
Email – the13podcast@gmail.com
IG: https://www.instagram.com/the13podcast
